email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, available for this route. Her DWT is 150,000, and LOA is 280m. The laycan is 15-20 October. Starting freight quote is in the low 50s ($50.50 per ton). Let me know if this works for you or if you’d like to discuss further. Best regards, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit higher than we were hoping for. Could you come down to the mid-40s? Also, can you confirm the laytime and demurrage terms? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I understand your concerns about the rate. After discussing with the owner, we can offer $48.75 per ton. Laytime is 72 hours total, and demurrage is set at $25,000 per day pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the revised offer. The rate is more in line with our expectations. However, could we push the laycan to 18-23 October? Also, can we cap the demurrage at $20,000 per day? Let me know if these adjustments are possible. Regards, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I’ve confirmed with the owner, and we can adjust the laycan to 18-23 October. However, the demurrage rate is firm at $25,000 per day. The freight rate remains at $48.75 per ton. If this works for you, we can proceed with the fixture. Let me know. Best, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the flexibility on the laycan. We can accept the demurrage terms at $25,000 per day. Let’s proceed with the fixture at $48.75 per ton. Please send over the recap for review. Cheers, John.

email_chain.subject: Fixture Recap - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, as discussed, please find the fixture recap below: Vessel: MV Ocean Star, DWT: 150,000, LOA: 280m. Cargo: Crude Oil, 140,000 MT. Load Port: Houston. Discharge Port: Rotterdam. Laycan: 18-23 October. Freight Rate: $48.75 per ton. Demurrage: $25,000 per day pro rata. Please confirm if everything looks good. Best regards, Sarah.
